summary: A gang of thieves plan to make their fortune by stealing a shipment of contraceptive pills from Finisham maternity hospital. They assume disguises and infiltrate the hospital, but everything doesn't go according to plan.
cast: Sidney James|Kenneth Williams|Charles Hawtrey|Joan Sims|Hattie Jacques|Bernard Bresslaw|Kenneth Cope|Terry Scott|Barbara Windsor|Kenneth Connor|Jacki Piper|Bill Maynard|Patsy Rowlands|Derek Francis|Amelia Bayntun|Valerie Leon|Brian Osborne|Gwendolyn Watts|Valerie Shute|Margaret Nolan|Michael Nightingale|Wendy Richard|Zena Clifton|Bill Kenwright|Robin Hunter|Jack Douglas|Madeline Smith|Juliet Harmer|Shakira Caine|Rodney Cardiff|Angela Cheyne|Laura Collins|Shirley English|Jill Goldston|Gilly Grant|Alan Harris|Walter Henry|Elizabeth Knight|Lindsay Marsh|Lesley North|Tina Simmons|Yutte Stensgaard|Bill Westley Sr.
title: Carry on Matron
